attributes.additional_details:
Free Marian Price - former hunger striker who has been imprisoned by the Secretary of State for Northern Ireland Owen Patterson since 15/05/2011.
At first she was remanded in custody in the all male prison at Maghaberry, this must be deemed a flagrant abuse of her human rights. She is being persecuted for her beliefs in a free socialist 32 county republic.
This petition is to call for her immediate release.
